element.name: JLCommentsPro Zoo Element
element.author: JoomLine
element.description: Plugin allow integrate VK comments and Facebook comments into your ZOO components

param.name: showvkontakte
param.label: Enable tab VKontakte
param.description: Display tab of social network Vkontakte

param.name: showcounter
param.label: Count of comments JComments
param.description: Display the number of comments JComments

param.name: width
param.label: Width comments
param.description: Enter comments or width of the block. If you specify 0 - then the width of the page

param.name: attach
param.label: Attach a file
param.description: Specifies the ability to create attachments to the comments

param.name: autoPublish
param.label: Auto publication
param.description: Automatic publishing a comment to the status of the user

param.name: norealtime
param.label: Auto-update
param.description: Updating the tape in real-time comments

param.name: fbadmin
param.label: Moderators Facebook
param.description: Enter the user names separated by commas

param.name: typeviewer
param.label: Type of display
param.description: If the first option does not work. Specify a second and try again.

param.name: unic
param.label: Mode uniqueness comments
param.description: Setting id comment. Old - binding mode is used not only to the comment ID of the article but also to the menu item ID. New - in this mode, the comments attached to the article ID and some static prefix (It is recommended that if the plugin has not previously been used, or used plug JL Comments).
